data.title: Biography of Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough 1851-1920
data.meta_description: Biography of Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough 1851-1920 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 01 Mar 1851 Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough was born to Walter William Brabazon Ponsonby 7th Earl Bessborough (age 29) and Louisa Susan Cornwallis Eliot Countess Bessborough 1825-1911 (age 25).

On 26 Nov 1852 John Josiah Guest 1st Baronet (age 67) died. His son [his future brother-in-law] Ivor Bertie Guest (age 17) succeeded 2nd Baronet Guest of Dowlais in Glamorganshire.

On 26 Oct 1865 [his uncle] Charles George Cornwallis Eliot (age 26) and [his future sister-in-law] Constance Rhiannon Guest (age 21) were married. He the son of Edward Granville Eliot 3rd Earl St Germans 1798-1877 (age 67) and Jemima Cornwallis Countess St Germans 1803-1856.

On 23 Apr 1867 [his future brother-in-law] Arthur Edward Guest (age 25) and Adeline Mary Chapman were married.

On 25 May 1868 [his future brother-in-law] Ivor Bertie Guest (age 32) and Cornelia Henrietta Maria Spencer-Churchill Baroness Wimborne (age 20) were married. She the daughter of John Winston Spencer-Churchill 7th Duke of Marlborough 1822-1883 (age 45) and Frances Anne Emily Vane Duchess of Marlborough (age 46).

On 22 Apr 1875 Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 24) and Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 28) were married. He the son of Walter William Brabazon Ponsonby 7th Earl Bessborough (age 53) and Louisa Susan Cornwallis Eliot Countess Bessborough 1825-1911 (age 49).

In 1876 [his daughter] Olwen Verene Ponsonby was born to Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 24) and [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 29).

On 08 Mar 1877 [his brother-in-law] Thomas Merthyr Guest (age 39) and Theodora Grosvenor (age 36) were married. She the daughter of Richard Grosvenor 2nd Marquess Westminster 1795-1869 and Elizabeth Mary Leveson-Gower Marchioness Westminster 1797-1891 (age 80).

In 1878 [his daughter] Helen Blanche Irene Ponsonby was born to Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 26) and [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 31).

In 1880 [his son] Vere Brabazon Ponsonby 9th Earl Bessborough 1880-1956 was born to Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 28) and [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 33).

On 30 Apr 1880 [his brother-in-law] Ivor Bertie Guest (age 44) was created 1st Baron Wimborne of Canford Magna in Dorset. Cornelia Henrietta Maria Spencer-Churchill Baroness Wimborne (age 32) by marriage Baroness Wimborne of Canford Magna in Dorset.

In 1881 [his son] Cyril Myles Ponsonby was born to Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 29) and [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 34).

In 1885 [his son] Bertie Brabazon Ponsonby was born to Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 33) and [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 38).

In 1888 [his daughter] Gweneth Frida Ponsonby was born to Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 36) and [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 41).

On 11 Mar 1895 [his uncle] Frederick George Brabazon Ponsonby 6th Earl Bessborough 1815-1895 (age 79) died. His brother [his father] Walter William Brabazon Ponsonby 7th Earl Bessborough (age 73) succeeded 7th Earl Bessborough. [his mother] Louisa Susan Cornwallis Eliot Countess Bessborough 1825-1911 (age 69) by marriage Countess Bessborough.

On 17 Jul 1898 [his brother-in-law] Arthur Edward Guest (age 56) died.

On 05 Jun 1902 [his sister-in-law] Charlotte Maria Guest (age 67) died.

On 05 Nov 1904 [his brother-in-law] Thomas Merthyr Guest (age 66) died.

On 24 Feb 1906 [his father] Walter William Brabazon Ponsonby 7th Earl Bessborough (age 84) died. His son Edward Ponsonby 8th Earl Bessborough (age 54) succeeded 8th Earl Bessborough. [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 59) by marriage Countess Bessborough.

On 09 Nov 1909 [his brother-in-law] Montague John Guest (age 70) died.

On 15 Jan 1911 [his mother] Louisa Susan Cornwallis Eliot Countess Bessborough 1825-1911 (age 85) died.

On 01 Nov 1912 [his sister-in-law] Mary Enid Evelyn Guest (age 69) died.

On 22 Feb 1914 [his brother-in-law] Ivor Bertie Guest (age 78) died. His son Ivor Churchill Guest 1st Viscount Wimborne (age 41) succeeded 2nd Baron Wimborne of Canford Magna in Dorset, 3rd Baronet Guest of Dowlais in Glamorganshire.

In 1915 [his son] Cyril Myles Ponsonby (age 34) died.

On 22 Mar 1916 [his sister-in-law] Constance Rhiannon Guest (age 72) died.

On 11 Oct 1919 [his wife] Blanche Vere Guest Countess Bessborough 1847-1919 (age 72) died.

Kings Wessex: Great x 24 Grand Son of King Edmund "Ironside" I of England

Kings Gwynedd: Great x 21 Grand Son of Owain "Great" King Gwynedd 1100-1170

Kings Seisyllwg: Great x 26 Grand Son of Hywel "Dda aka Good" King Seisyllwg King Deheubarth

Kings Powys: Great x 22 Grand Son of Maredudd ap Bleddyn King Powys 1047-1132

Kings England: Great x 12 Grand Son of King Henry VII of England and Ireland

Kings Scotland: Great x 17 Grand Son of King Robert the Bruce I of Scotland

Kings Franks: Great x 20 Grand Son of Louis VII King Franks

Kings France: Great x 15 Grand Son of Charles "Beloved Mad" VI King France
